job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Responsible for the research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.
   Keep up with the latest technology research and breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, Deep Learning and knowledge graphs.
   Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.
   Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms. Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

Responsible for the research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.
   Keep up with the latest technology research and breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, Deep Learning and knowledge graphs.
   Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.
   Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms. Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes research and implementation of core algorithms in NLP and GenAI, with a specific focus on training and optimizing large language models (LLMs) using techniques like RLHF. It also mentions exploring cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in this domain, designing, implementing, and testing overall solutions. While time series forecasting and anomaly detection are mentioned, the primary focus and detailed responsibilities lean heavily towards generative AI and LLMs, aligning with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.' It also details 'training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.' Furthermore, it discusses 'Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms.'

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses' directly relates to the core process of creating, training, and adapting machine learning models, specifically generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms' points to the development and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions' implies building and integrating AI features into solutions, which aligns with software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions
